DOC.brief_summary: An increase dietary protein intake show blunt increase intrahepatic fat induce high fat feed healthy individual . The purpose study determine protein supplementation decrease intrahepatic fat obese patient non-alcoholic fatty liver disease .
DOC.brief_title: A Pilot Study Whey Protein Supplementation Non Alcoholic Fatty Liver Disease
DOC.detailed_description: 12 obese patient treat dietary whey protein supplementation 4 week . Their intrahepatic fat content , glucose tolerance , body weight evaluated 4 week supplementation .
DOC.criteria: BMI high 35 kg/m2 age 1850 year sex male female ASAT/ALAT > 1.8 treatment hypolemic antidiabetic agent blood glucose > 7 mmol/l alcohol intake > 20g/day creatinin > 120 umol/l ) contraindication Magnetic resonnance imaging
